nodes.text: The Traptoforia system was a star system that was located within the Thrasybule sector, which was a part of the galactic regions known as the Outer Rim Territories and the Trans-Hydian. The system was home to the creatures known as Traptoforian razor slugs.
The Traptoforia system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square P-6.
